result.eng: Reveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.html: nocht do chuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.ponchtml: noċt do ċuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.

result.eng: It was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ga: nochtadh i mbéal feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mbaile Átha cliath um thráthnóna
result.orig: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.html: nochtadh i mbéal feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mbaile Átha cliath um thráthnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ponchtml: noċtaḋ i mbéal feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mbaile Áṫa cliaṫ um ṫráṫnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.

result.eng: The sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ga: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.orig: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh

result.eng: Errigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
